Key.Original: Only pilots are allowed to fly!
Key.English: Only pilots are allowed to fly!
Key.German: Es ist nur Piloten erlaubt zu fliegen!

Key.Original: This place is reserved for the crew!
Key.English: This place is reserved for the crew!

Key.Original: Mines may only be laid by explosive technicians! Mine was deleted.
Key.English: Mines may only be laid by explosive technicians! Mine was deleted.
Key.German: Minen dürfen nur von Sprengmeister gelegt werden! Mine wurde gelöscht.

Key.Original: UAV station \n\n Logged into UAV station. Connection is lost if more than 4m away.
Key.English: UAV station \n\n Logged into UAV station. Connection is lost if more than 4m away.
Key.German: UAV-Station \n\n In UAV-Station eingeloggt. Verbindung geht verloren, wenn mehr als 4m entfernt.

Key.Original: UAV station \n\n Logged out of UAV station.
Key.English: UAV station \n\n Logged out of UAV station.

Key.Original: UAV station \n\n Connection to UAV station lost.
Key.English: UAV station \n\n Connection to UAV station lost.

Key.Original: Weapon inadmissible for current player class.\n\n Weapon has been removed.
Key.English: Weapon inadmissible for current player class.\n\n Weapon has been removed.
Key.German: Waffe unzulässig für aktuelle Spielerklasse.\n\n Waffe wurde entfernt.
